Articles.Content:
i have a problem and i hope that someone can help me ....

 

i have Bobcat`s Kliper Mod and now its working for me in KSP 1.4.5, but there is one little problem... on the Runway and also after landing the wheels sink into the ground... only the wheels, the body of the vehicle lies on the ground after that....

I think it has something to do with the wheel collider, but unfortunately I have no idea of programming (Unity, Blender i have really no idea and no skills in programming) ....

is there a way to fix that? can someone help me?
